message: Let's split it 50/50, a fair start!
You could have gotten more in round 1, now it's my turn to make a better offer!
You're getting greedy, Bob! I'll give you a slightly better deal this time.
I'm not getting desperate yet, but you should be!
You're getting closer, Bob, but I'm not giving in yet!
I'm starting to think you're not serious about getting a fair deal, Alice!
I'm not giving up yet, Bob! I'll give you a slightly better deal this time.
You're running out of time, Alice. It's time to make a serious offer!
I'm not going down without a fight, Bob! This is my last chance to make a good offer.
It's almost over, Alice. You're not even getting a decent fraction of the money at this point.
I'm not giving up yet, Bob! I'll give you one last chance to make a deal.
It's now or never, Alice. Take it or leave it.
